mnd13:5.2: saccanti ca vādayanti → saccanti pavādayanti (s1-3) | saccanti ca pavādiyanti (pts1) | saccanti vivādayanti (^snp4.13#365 [Mahābyūhasutta])
mnd13:34.2: Pavedhatī → sa vedhati (bj) | sa vedhatī (s1-3, pts1)
mnd13:44.8: patthenti, puthujjanakalyāṇakā → kalyāṇaputhujjanā (s1-3, pts1), niyāmāvakkantiṃ → niyāmāvattantiṃ (mr)
mnd13:44.11: vuddhipārihānivītivatto → vuddhiparihāniṃ vītivatto (bj, s1, pts1) | vuḍḍhiparihāniṃ vītivatto (s2, s3) | vuddhiparihānivītivatto (^mnd10#121 [Purābhedasuttaniddesa])
mnd13:83.3: Sabbeva vādā → sabbe pavādā (s1-3, pts1), tathiyā → tathivā (si, s1-3, pts1)
mnd13:127.6: gathite ganthite → ganthe gathite (pts1), bandhe vibandhe ābandhe → baddhe vibaddhe ābaddhe (bj)
mnd13:128.2: Vivādajātesu sañjātesu nibbattesu abhinibbattesu pātubhūtesu → vivāde jāte sañjāte nibbatte abhinibbatte pātubhūte (bj, mr)
mnd13:154.2: munimuninoti → munimunino (s1, pts1, mr) | munimunayo (s2, s3)
